title: IOCTL_INTERNAL_USB_GET_DEVICE_HANDLE_EX (usbioctl.h)
description: The IOCTL_INTERNAL_USB_GET_DEVICE_HANDLE_EX IOCTL is used by the USB hub driver. Do not use.
